text: Volvo B7F and Volvo B7FA were a series of front-engined single-decker bus chassis manufactured by Volvo. While the B7FA was a more conventional front- engined chassis, the B7F had the engine mounted on top of the front axle, giving the buses very little front overhang. The models are not known to have been available in Europe, but they could at least be found in Latin America, New ZealandRitchies Transport Holdings - BLZ219 Australian Bus Fleet Lists and South Africa.Volvo B7F Anthony's Bus Homepage ==Volvo B270F== There may not be a full continuity back to the old B7F models, but at the plant in Curitiba, Brazil, Volvo are currently manufacturing the front-engined Volvo B270F for the Latin American market.
